p:
Estimates of the V
max and K
m of SaTPS1, SaTPS2 and SaTPS3 were determined by using the malachite green phosphate assay kit (Sigma-Aldrich, No. MAK307) following the method of Vardakou et al. (2014) [ 81]. One microgram of proteins with varying concentrations (0.5 μM to 50 μM) of substrates FPP or GPP and Mg 2+ in 500 μl of 25 mM HEPES buffer was reacted at 30°C for 10 min. The reaction was terminated by adding 10 μl of 5 M HCl. Released free phosphate was determined as described in the assay kit manual. The data was fit to a nonlinear regression of the Michaelis-Menten equation by using GraphPad Prism 7 to obtain V
max and K
m .
